mapper.insert: insert into orders(number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, amount, remark, phone, address, consignee, tableware_number, tableware_status, pay_status, delivery_status, delivery_time,pack_amount,estimated_delivery_time) values (#{number},#{status},#{userId},#{addressBookId},#{orderTime},#{checkoutTime},#{payMethod},#{amount}, #{remark},#{phone},#{address},#{consignee},#{tablewareNumber},#{tablewareStatus},#{payStatus},#{deliveryStatus},#{deliveryTime},#{packAmount},#{estimatedDeliveryTime})
